query: @message:"ConnectionFailed: Connection to neutron failed: Maximum attempts reached" AND @fields.filename:"console.html"
@tags:"logs/screen-n-sch.txt" AND @message:(tempest* AND "Setting instance to ERROR state")
@message:"Exit code: 5"  AND @message:" sudo cinder-rootwrap /etc/cinder/rootwrap.conf lvremove -f" AND @fields.filename:"logs/screen-c-vol.txt" AND @fields.build_status:"FAILURE"
@message:"Details: Time Limit Exceeded! (400s)while waiting for active, but we got killed." AND @fields.filename:"console.html" AND @fields.build_status:"FAILURE"
